name: Chaos Mage
description:
Description:

Created in a week for Big Festive Game Jam 2022

You're a Mage you channels spells from an exponentially growing pool of chaos. As you increase your level, you get access to more potential spells and more way to filter the chaos and select the spells you want to cast.

How to play:

Use your actions to identify and cast spells. As you level up you get more ways to manipulate the pool of chaos.

More detailed tutorial popup in game.
